Source.Name: krename
Source.Summary: Utility to handle specialised file renames
Source.Description: KRename is a very powerfull batch file renamer by KDE. It allows you to easily rename hundreds or even more files in one go. The filenames can be created by parts of the original filename, numbering the files or accessing hundreds of informations about the file, like creation date or Exif information of an image.
